title: The Boy & the island: Christopher Koch, Tasmanian novelist
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Corporation and John Muirhead
brief_description: A profile of novelist Christopher Koch including readings from his work and beautiful Tasmanian landscape scenes. This program is shot in colour with some black and white sequences and scenes from his novels are performed.
